channel.title: 317 Delta item protect glitch please help
channel.description:
Ok so my server is coming along nicely and as for this I've even got it to where item protect shuts off at 0 pray buuuuuut -___- you can turn it on during the death animation with 0 pray and it counts as on.
I've tried all different variations of: if ((ProtItem) && (playerLevel[5] > 0)) { applyProtectItemProt(); and if (playerLevel[5] < 1) { prayOff
along with what's already written for item protect and the glitch still happens, this is driving me nuts someone please help, I'll love you forever. :[

item.title: 317 Delta item protect glitch please help
item.dc:creator: @Aceflare0 Aceflare0
item.description:
@Aceflare0 wrote:

I ended up fixing that with this.

if ((ProtItem) && (playerLevel[5] < 1)) { prayOff

Read full topic
item.source: 317 Delta item protect glitch please help
